name: GGJ2021 - Lost and Found
description:
As long you lost in the forest, try to get to the exit before the time ended.
Just stay calm for the time limit, the time would only rewind to the very start.
Nothing would change, but you would found there's a ghost of you would do the exact same action like you before the time rewind.

Try to utilize your ability to get the way out of the forest.

Controls:
Move: WSAD 
Mouse: Navigation
